explanation: Funds are required for proper execution of field-based airborne power generation systems research. Funding for this requirement was appropriated in Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation,

Funds are available from a congressional add enacted as part of the DoD Appropriations Act, 2022 for field-based airborne power generation systems. This requirement is more properly executed in Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.
